eventDecorators.name: Proposal created
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the new proposal gets created.

parameterDecorators.name: Targets
parameterDecorators.description: Target addresses (`to` fields in the raw transactions)

parameterDecorators.name: Values
parameterDecorators.description: Values (eth amounts to send in the raw transactions)

parameterDecorators.name: Voting starts at
parameterDecorators.description: Timestamp defining the start of the voting process.

eventDecorators.name: Proposal canceled
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the proposal gets canceled.

eventDecorators.name: Proposal executed
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the proposal gets executed.

parameterDecorators.name: Proposal Id
parameterDecorators.description: Id of the proposal that was executed.

eventDecorators.name: Vote cast
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the new vote is casted for the proposal.

parameterDecorators.name: Support
parameterDecorators.description: Voting option chosen by the voter.

parameterDecorators.name: Reason
parameterDecorators.description: Reason provided by the voter when casting the vote.

eventDecorators.name: Vote cast with params
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the new vote is casted for the proposal, with the additional vote params attached to the vote.

parameterDecorators.name: Support
parameterDecorators.description: Voting option chosen by the voter.

parameterDecorators.name: Reason
parameterDecorators.description: Reason provided by the voter when casting the vote.

parameterDecorators.name: Parameters
parameterDecorators.description: Additional parameters provided by the voter if the counting mechanism requires additional parameters together with the voting option.

functionDecorators.name: Get name
functionDecorators.description: Returns the name of the governor instance (used in building the ERC712 domain separator).

returnDecorators.name: Name
returnDecorators.description: Name of the instance

functionDecorators.name: Get version
functionDecorators.description: Returns the version of the governor instance (used in building the ERC712 domain separator).

returnDecorators.name: Version
returnDecorators.description: Version of the governor instance

functionDecorators.name: Get counting mode
functionDecorators.description: Description of the possible vote options for castVote and the way these votes are counted, meant to be consumed by UIs to show correct vote options and interpret the results. The string is a URL-encoded sequence of key-value pairs that each describe one aspect, for example `support=bravo&quorum=for,abstain`

returnDecorators.name: Counting mode
returnDecorators.description: Counting used by this governance system.

functionDecorators.name: Calculate proposal hash
functionDecorators.description: Hashing function used to (re)build the proposal id from the proposal details.

parameterDecorators.name: Values
parameterDecorators.description: Values of ether to attach to every action target call.

parameterDecorators.name: Calldatas
parameterDecorators.description: Encoded function with parameters to call on targets.

returnDecorators.name: Proposal hash
returnDecorators.description: Hash of the provided proposal data.

functionDecorators.name: Get state
functionDecorators.description: Returns the state of the given proposal.

returnDecorators.name: State
returnDecorators.description: 0 - Pending; 1 - Active; 2 - Canceled; 3 - Defeated; 4 - Succeeded; 5 - Queued; 6 - Expired; 7 - Executed;

functionDecorators.name: Get proposal snapshot
functionDecorators.description: Returns the snapshot - block number at which the voting starts.

returnDecorators.name: Snapshot
returnDecorators.description: Block number at which the voting will start

functionDecorators.name: Get proposal deadline
functionDecorators.description: Returns the given proposal deadline, block number at which the voting ends.

returnDecorators.name: Proposal deadline
returnDecorators.description: Block number of the proposal deadline

functionDecorators.name: Get voting delay
functionDecorators.description: Delay, in number of block, between the proposal is created and the vote starts.

returnDecorators.name: Delay
returnDecorators.description: Voting delay in number of blocks.

functionDecorators.name: Get voting period
functionDecorators.description: Delay, in number of blocks, between the vote start and vote ends.

returnDecorators.name: Voting period
returnDecorators.description: Voting period in number of blocks.

functionDecorators.name: Get past quorum
functionDecorators.description: Retrieves the minimum number of votes casted for a proposal to be successful. This allows to scale the quorum depending on values such as the totalSupply of a token at this block (see ERC20Votes).

parameterDecorators.name: Block number
parameterDecorators.description: Block number at which the quorum is being read.

returnDecorators.name: Voting power
returnDecorators.description: Voting power required for a proposal to pass, at a given block number.

functionDecorators.name: Get votes
functionDecorators.description: Returns the voting power the account at a specified point in time.

parameterDecorators.name: Block number
parameterDecorators.description: Block number at which the voting power is checked for the account.

returnDecorators.name: Voting power
returnDecorators.description: Voting power of the account

functionDecorators.name: Get votes with parameters
functionDecorators.description: Returns the voting power the account owned at a specified point in time given additional encoded parameters.

parameterDecorators.name: Block number
parameterDecorators.description: Block number at which the voting power is checked for the account.

returnDecorators.name: Voting power
returnDecorators.description: Voting power of the account

functionDecorators.name: Has voted
functionDecorators.description: Returns wether given account has cast a vote on the given proposal.

returnDecorators.name: Has voted
returnDecorators.description: Has user voted result

functionDecorators.name: Create proposal
functionDecorators.description: Creates new proposal

parameterDecorators.name: Targets
parameterDecorators.description: Target smart contracts to call if proposal is executed.

parameterDecorators.name: Values
parameterDecorators.description: Values of ether to attach to every action target call.

parameterDecorators.name: Calldatas
parameterDecorators.description: Encoded function with parameters to call on targets.

returnDecorators.name: Proposal id
returnDecorators.description: Id of the successfully created proposal

functionDecorators.name: Execute proposal
functionDecorators.description: Execute a successful proposal. This requires the quorum to be reached, the vote to be successful, and the deadline to be reached.

parameterDecorators.name: Targets
parameterDecorators.description: Target smart contracts defined in the successful proposal.

parameterDecorators.name: Values
parameterDecorators.description: Values of ether to attach to every action of the passed proposal.

parameterDecorators.name: Calldatas
parameterDecorators.description: Encoded function with parameters to call on targets defined in the proposal.

returnDecorators.name: Proposal Id
returnDecorators.description: Returns the proposal id of the executed proposal.

functionDecorators.name: Cast vote
functionDecorators.description: Casts vote for provided proposal.

parameterDecorators.name: Proposal Id
parameterDecorators.description: Id of the proposal for which the vote is being cast.

returnDecorators.name: Voting power
returnDecorators.description: Voter's voting power used when casting the vote.

functionDecorators.name: Cast vote with reason
functionDecorators.description: Casts vote for a proposal while also providing the reason for the vote.

parameterDecorators.name: Proposal Id
parameterDecorators.description: Id of the proposal for which the vote is being cast.

parameterDecorators.name: Reason
parameterDecorators.description: Reason behind this vote decision - any textual value.

returnDecorators.name: Voting power
returnDecorators.description: Voter's voting power used when casting the vote.

functionDecorators.name: Cast vote with reason
functionDecorators.description: Casts vote for a proposal while also providing the reason for the vote and additional encoded parameters.

parameterDecorators.name: Proposal Id
parameterDecorators.description: Id of the proposal for which the vote is being cast.

parameterDecorators.name: Reason
parameterDecorators.description: Reason behind this vote decision - any textual value.

parameterDecorators.name: Parameters
parameterDecorators.description: Encoded additional parameters attached to the vote decision.

returnDecorators.name: Voting power
returnDecorators.description: Voter's voting power used when casting the vote.

functionDecorators.name: Cast vote by signature
functionDecorators.description: Casts a vote for proposal using the user's cryptographic signature.

parameterDecorators.name: Proposal Id
parameterDecorators.description: Id of the proposal for which the vote is being cast.

returnDecorators.name: Voting power
returnDecorators.description: Voter's voting power used when casting the vote.

functionDecorators.name: Cast vote by signature with data
functionDecorators.description: Cast a vote with a reason and additional encoded parameters using the user's cryptographic signature.

parameterDecorators.name: Proposal Id
parameterDecorators.description: Id of the proposal for which the vote is being cast.

parameterDecorators.name: Reason
parameterDecorators.description: Reason behind this vote decision - any textual value.

parameterDecorators.name: Parameters
parameterDecorators.description: Encoded additional parameters attached to the vote decision.

returnDecorators.name: Voting power
returnDecorators.description: Voter's voting power used when casting the vote.
